recipesJson.name: #THECHRISTMASMIX 2017 Mango Frozen Yogurt
recipesJson.author: Kemmo
recipesJson.description: Here's my recipe for the charity show at the end of 2017 on DiyOrDie. It's been a huge year in diy, and we're going out with a BANG! This is as close as I've come to date in creating a creamy frozen yogurt that translates well in to a vape. I went with adding mango as it's a tasty and familiar flavour. Thank you all for such a great year, looking forward to 2018!
